name: GOLDEN FIST
description:
A RPG Where you play as a Hipster Gangster! Get revenge on the evil organization that replaced you (HUKI)!! Explore a city full of rats and gamblers!! journey with a friend to a small outpost to meet a wizard!!!! Take the thrones of the kings/queens who are in on the gig with the HUKI organization!!! 

Average play time 30 minutes

Feedback for updates please

EVERTHING IN THIS GAME IS BY ME!!
